AutoRollbackRenamer Class Reference

AutoRollbackRenamer handles the renaming of files which is needed when producing a new version of a file which may fail. On failure the old version is put back in place. More...

Detailed Description

AutoRollbackRenamer handles the renaming of files which is needed when producing a new version of a file which may fail. On failure the old version is put back in place.
